snippet: Wal-Mart Stores is taking its first legal step to stop months of protests and rallies outside Walmart stores, targeting the union that it says is behind such actions.
abstract: Wal-Mart Stores is taking its first legal step to stop months of protests and rallies outside its stores, targeting the United Food and Commercial Workers International Union.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores is taking its first legal step to stop months of protests and rallies outside Walmart stores, targeting the union that it says is behind such actions.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Takes Legal Action to Stop Protests at Stores
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Takes Legal Action To Stop Protests at Stores

keywords.value: United Food and Commercial Workers Union
keywords.name: organizations
